title: The x-edel-lifecycle object

maturity.description: The maturity level of the API. It MUST contain one of the following values: development,supported,deprecated.

deprecated_at.description: The date when the API has been deprecated. The date format MUST follow [RFC3339]

sunset_at.description: The date when the API will be sunset. The date format MUST follow [RFC3339]

description: The x-edel-lifecycle object is a specification extension defined in the API Core Profile. Its main purpose is to provide lifecycle metadata of the API such as its maturity, deprecation and sunset
